Step into this beautiful two-story, single-family home located in The Colony, TX, USA, priced at $1,150,000. This charming property features 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a spacious living room with a cozy fireplace, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a large backyard with paverstone patio perfect for family gatherings. The master bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet with extra storage under the spiral staircase. Enjoy the convenience of an attached two-car garage. Located near top-rated schools, two neighborhood pools with amenities, two golf courses, bike trails, a kayak launch, and nearby grocery stores, this home is ideal for families looking for comfort and convenience.
